string.value: #b#p9270062##k just realized he needs something he can use as travel expenses while going around the city. Maybe #b#t4000477##k could come useful because they're such a rare item in the city.

#b#t4000477#s#k can be sold at a high price in the city market place. #b#p9270062##k must have plenty of them before the trip, otherwise he would come short of travel expenses in the middle of the trip. 

#o9420539# #r#a45581##k 
#t4000477# #r#c4000477#/200#k
Now #b#p9270062##k is fully ready for the trip, and it's time to enjoy. Yeah!

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 54,500 Able to proceed to 'Gift for Brother' as next quest.
I have enough #b#t4000475#s#k with me, but I'm worried I won't have enough finances during the trip. I heard prices in the city are really high.
If I bring some #b#t4000477#s#k with me, I will be able to sell them in the city market place to cover my expenses! I heard that they are a very rare and valuable item in the city.
Will you be so kind as to bring #b200 #t4000477#s#k so I can take them with me to the city?
Why, thank you so much. You could gather those #b#t4000477#s#k from #b#o9420539#s#k.
Hey! I thought you would assist me a while longer...
Hello, my friend. Did you bring what I asked for?
Thank you so much. I'm so excited now! Hmm...do I have everything? I'm not sure...
Everything is very expensive in the city, so I need more #b#t4000477#s#k than that.
I understand that #b#o9420539##k is a very vicious creature, but this trip is my dream of life time.
